MajorGlobalItem.name: TDM_REFRESH_REFERENCE_DATA
MajorGlobalItem.Comment: This global is used to determine if to refresh the Logical Unit's reference data before the data migration

MajorGlobalItem.name: TDM_REQUEST_OF_FRESH_DATA
MajorGlobalItem.Comment: This global is used to determine if force the synchronization of the entities in the Test Data Warehouse (TDW)

MajorGlobalItem.name: TDM_DELETE_BEFORE_LOAD
MajorGlobalItem.Comment: This global is used to determine if to delete the entities being migrated from the target database

MajorGlobalItem.name: TDM_REPLACE_SEQUENCES
MajorGlobalItem.Comment: This global is used to determine if replace the table's keys with new sequences to prevent duplication failure as part of the migration process

MajorGlobalItem.name: TDM_TARGET_PRODUCT_VERSION
MajorGlobalItem.Comment: The version of the product on the target system

MajorGlobalItem.name: TDM_INSTANCE_SEQ_NAME
MajorGlobalItem.Comment: This global contains the name of DB sequence of the entity id and is used by scGetExecutionStats script if sequences are replaced

MajorGlobalItem.name: TDM_SET_SYNC_OFF
MajorGlobalItem.Comment: Indicator to set sync off when getting an entity from Fabric by TDM (default is false)

MajorGlobalItem.name: STATS_REPORT_MODE
MajorGlobalItem.Comment: used in scGetExecutionStats. valid values : Fabric_Only or anything else

MajorGlobalItem.name: TDM_TASK_EXE_ID
MajorGlobalItem.Comment: leave value empty. in case of TDM : value will get popualted by TDM GUI

MajorGlobalItem.name: TDM_TAR_ENV_NAME
MajorGlobalItem.Comment: leave value empty. in case of TDM : value will get popualted by TDM GUI

MajorGlobalItem.name: TDM_INSERT_TO_TARGET
MajorGlobalItem.Comment: this global will be set to false only in case of DELETE ONLY option for TDM task

MajorGlobalItem.name: TDM_SOURCE_ENVIRONMENT_NAME
MajorGlobalItem.Comment: this global will be populated by TDM according to the source environment of the task.the ADI sets the active environment in fabric based on this global
